title: 12a00 - Statutory definition and IB.
text:
(a)           
FLSA Sec 3(r) defines the
“enterprise” which is the business unit tested for coverage under Sec 3(s). IB
779.200 through 779.235 contains the official Wage-Hour interpretations
regarding the principles which determine the activities which are included
within an enterprise for purposes of the Act. (b)          
Effective 7/1/72, the Education
Amendments of 1972 amended Sec 3(r)(1) to include preschools within the
coverage of the Act. Sec (r)(1) as amended reads as follows:  “(1) in connection with the operation of a hospital, an institution
primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the aged, the mentally ill or
defective who reside on the premises of such institution a. school for mentally
or physically handicapped or gifted children, a preschool, elementary or secondary
school, or an institution of higher education (regardless of whether or not
such hospital, institution or school is public or private or operated for
profit or not for profit), or” (c)           
Effective 5/1/74, the 1974
Amendments amended Sec 3(r) to include all public agencies within coverage of
the Act. Sec 3(r)(3) of the amended Act reads as follows:  “(3)           in connection with the activities of a public agency”.

(a)            FLSA Sec 3(r) defines the “enterprise” which is the business unit tested for coverage under Sec 3(s). IB 779.200 through 779.235 contains the official Wage-Hour interpretations regarding the principles which determine the activities which are included within an enterprise for purposes of the Act.

 

(b)           Effective 7/1/72, the Education Amendments of 1972 amended Sec 3(r)(1) to include preschools within the coverage of the Act. Sec (r)(1) as amended reads as follows:

 

“(1) in connection with the operation of a hospital, an institution primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the aged, the mentally ill or defective who reside on the premises of such institution a. school for mentally or physically handicapped or gifted children, a preschool, elementary or secondary school, or an institution of higher education (regardless of whether or not such hospital, institution or school is public or private or operated for profit or not for profit), or”

 

(c)            Effective 5/1/74, the 1974 Amendments amended Sec 3(r) to include all public agencies within coverage of the Act. Sec 3(r)(3) of the amended Act reads as follows:

 

“(3)           in connection with the activities of a public agency”.
